Hashing

This section is incomplete and needs further work!

Hashing

  • Word:

    $ echo -n '<WORD>' | openssl <md5|sha1|sha512|sha3-512> [| cut -d ' ' -f 2]

Hash Identifying

  • Via haiti:

    $ haiti '<HASH>'

  • Via hashcat1):

    $ hashcat --show '<HASH>'

Extracting Hash

  • From zip: 

    $ zip2john <ZIP> 2> /dev/null

Cracking

Hashcat

  1. List available OpenCL2) devices for cracking: 

    $ hashcat -I

  2. Crack passwords:
    • Dictionary cracking: 

      $ hashcat -a 0 [-D <DEVICE-NUMBER>] -m <HASH-ID-NUMBER> '<HASH>' <DICTIONARY> [-o <OUTPUT-FILE>]

  3. Rainbow table from cracked passwords: ~/.local/share/hashcat/hashcat.potfile
1)
Hashcat's hash examples: https://hashcat.net/wiki/doku.php?id=example_hashes.
2)
Debian OpenCL packages: https://packages.debian.org/buster/opencl-icd.
